prompts.name: Code Review
prompts.description: Review for PRs that change source code. Covers correctness, style, performance, security, and test coverage.

prompts.name: Design Review
prompts.description: Review for PRs that add or change design documents (DESIGN.md). Evaluates architecture, trade-offs, API contracts, industry alignment, and antipatterns.

prompts.name: ADR Review
prompts.description: Review for PRs that add or change Architecture Decision Records. Checks problem scoping, template compliance, and overlap with existing ADRs.

prompts.name: PRD Review
prompts.description: Review for PRs that add or change PRD/requirements documents. Evaluates completeness, testability, traceability, and industry alignment.
